tool_description: Pinnacle Sport API is a RESTful service for getting pre-match and live odds. Historical odds, score and results. Updates without delay. Sports: Soccer, tennis, basketball, hockey, american football, MMA, baseball. **Support**:  [tipsters@rapi.one](mailto:tipsters@rapi.one) / t.me/api_tipsters **Other sports api:** https://rapi.one
name: Pinnacle Odds
title: Pinnacle Odds

api_list.name: List of Special markets
api_list.description: Get a list of special markets. Always first issue a snapshot call and continue with the delta calls. Calls return changes since the provided `since` value. You must always use the since parameter, after the first call. Please note that prematch and live events are different

optional_parameters.name: is_have_odds
optional_parameters.description: `1` or `0`. You can only get matches for which there are already open odds, or matches that will be given odds in the future

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Since UTC time. Calls return changes since the provided `since` value.

optional_parameters.name: event_type
optional_parameters.description: Status: `prematch`, `live`  Please note that prematch and live events are different

api_list.name: Event Details
api_list.description: Get a event details and history odds. history:[time, value, max bet]. `Period_results - status`: 1 = Event period is settled, 2 = Event period is re-settled, 3 = Event period is cancelled, 4 = Event period is re-settled as cancelled, 5 = Event is deleted

api_list.name: List of Leagues
List of Periods
List of Markets
api_list.description: Get a list of markets. Always first issue a snapshot call and continue with the delta calls. Calls return changes since the provided `since` value.  You must always use the `since` parameter, after starting your program cycle. You can make request without a `since` parameter no more than 25 times in 5 minutes. Please note that `prematch` and `live` events are different

optional_parameters.name: event_type
optional_parameters.description: Status: `prematch`, `live`  Please note that prematch and live events are different

optional_parameters.name: since
optional_parameters.description: Since UTC time. Calls return changes since the provided `since` value.

optional_parameters.name: is_have_odds
optional_parameters.description: `1` or `0`. You can only get matches for which there are already open odds, or matches that will be given odds in the future

last.title: Last
last.description: Time of last update markets (unix timestamp)

special_last.title: Special Last
special_last.description: Time of last update special markets (unix timestamp)

last_call.title: Last Call
last_call.description: Time of last update of general data (unix timestamp)

last.title: Last
last.description: Time of last update markets (unix timestamp)

parent_id.title: Parent Id
parent_id.description: If event is linked to another event, parentId will be populated. Live event would have pre game event as parent id.

resulting_unit.title: Resulting Unit
resulting_unit.description: Specifies based on what the event will be resulted, e.g. Corners, Bookings

number.title: Number
number.description: This represents the period of the match

cutoff.title: Cutoff
cutoff.description: Period’s wagering cut-off date in UTC

period_status.title: Period Status
period_status.description: 1 - online, period is open for betting 2 - offline, period is not open for betting

number.title: Number
number.description: This represents the period of the match

status.title: Status
status.description: 1 = Event period is settled, 2 = Event period is re-settled, 3 = Event period is cancelled, 4 = Event period is re-settled as cancelled, 5 = Event is deleted

settlement_id.title: Settlement Id
settlement_id.description: Unique id of the settlement. In case of a re-settlement, a new settlementId and settledAt will be generated

settled_at.title: Settled At
settled_at.description: Date and time in UTC when the period was settled.

alt_line_id.title: Alt Line Id
alt_line_id.description: This is present only if it’s alternative line

number.title: Number
number.description: This represents the period of the match

status.title: Status
status.description: 1 = Event period is settled, 2 = Event period is re-settled, 3 = Event period is cancelled, 4 = Event period is re-settled as cancelled, 5 = Event is deleted

settlement_id.description: Unique id of the settlement. In case of a re-settlement, a new settlementId and settledAt will be generated

settled_at.title: Settled At
settled_at.description: Date and time in UTC when the period was settled.

api_list.name: Betting status
api_list.description: Get a betting status. Checking the Pinnacle server
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pinnacle-odds.p.rapidapi.com/kit/v1/betting-status"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pinnacle-odds.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pinnacle-odds.p.rapidapi.com/kit/v1/betting-status"

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
